snippet: A bill that would have allowed home-schooled children in Virginia to play varsity sports at public high schools was defeated Thursday by a state Senate committee.
abstract: Legislation in Virginia that would have allowed home-schooled children to play varsity sports at public high schools is defeated a State Senate committee.
lead_paragraph: A bill that would have allowed home-schooled children in Virginia to play varsity sports at public high schools was defeated Thursday by a state Senate committee.

headline.seo: Bill’s Defeat a Blow to Home-Schooled Athletes
headline.main: Bill’s Defeat a Blow to Home-Schooled Athletes
